mapper.insert: INSERT INTO ATTENDANCE ( ATTEND_NUM, USER_NO, USER_NAME, ATTEND_DATE, NORMAL_CHECK, IRREGULAR_REASON ) VALUES ( #{attend_num}, #{user_no}, #{user_name}, SYSDATE, '근무정보없음', '근무정보없음' )
INSERT INTO WORKTIME ( WORKTIME_NUM, USER_NO, ATTEND_DATE, IN_TIME, OUT_TIME, TOTAL_WORK_TIME ) VALUES ( '0', #{user_no}, SYSDATE, '000000', '000000', '0' )
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM ATTENDANCE WHERE USER_NO = #{user_no} AND TO_CHAR(ATTEND_DATE,'YYYYMMDD') = TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'YYYYMMDD')
SELECT * FROM WORKTIME WHERE USER_NO = #{user_no} AND TO_CHAR(ATTEND_DATE,'YYYYMMDD') = TO_CHAR(SYSDATE - 1,'YYYYMMDD')
SELECT COUNT(*) AS ATTEND_MOD_NUM FROM ATTENDANCEMODIFY WHERE USER_NO = #{user_no} AND TO_CHAR(REQ_DATE,'YYYYMMDD') = TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'YYYYMMDD') AND APPROVE_STATE != '승인됨'

SELECT WORKTIME_NUM, USER_NO, ATTEND_DATE, REGEXP_REPLACE(IN_TIME, '(.{2})(.{2})(.{2})', '\1시 \2분 \3초') AS IN_TIME, REGEXP_REPLACE(OUT_TIME, '(.{2})(.{2})(.{2})', '\1시 \2분 \3초') AS OUT_TIME, TOTAL_WORK_TIME FROM WORKTIME WHERE USER_NO = #{user_no} AND TO_CHAR(ATTEND_DATE,'YYYYMMDD') = TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'YYYYMMDD')

SELECT A.ATTEND_DATE, A.WORK_NUMOFDATE, M.ATTEND_MOD_NUM, W.TOTAL_WORK_TIME FROM ATTENDANCE A INNER JOIN ATTENDANCEMODIFY M ON(A.ATTEND_NUM = M.ATTEND_NUM) INNER JOIN WORKTIME W ON(M.ATTEND_NUM = W.ATTEND_NUM)
mapper.update: UPDATE WORKTIME SET WORKTIME_NUM = #{worktime_num}, IN_TIME = TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'HH24MISS') WHERE WORKTIME_NUM = 0
UPDATE WORKTIME SET OUT_TIME = TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'HH24MISS') WHERE TO_CHAR(ATTEND_DATE,'YYYYMMDD') = TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'YYYYMMDD')
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO ATTENDANCEMODIFY ( ATTEND_MOD_NUM, USER_NO, USER_NAME, REQ_DATE, MOD_REASON, ATTACH_FILE, ATTACH_FILE_SIZE, APPROVE_STATE ) VALUES ( #{attend_mod_num}, #{user_no}, #{user_name}, TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'YYYYMMDD'), #{mod_reason}, '첨부파일 없음', 0, '처리중' )
mapper.select: SELECT ATTEND_MOD_NUM, TO_CHAR(REQ_DATE,'YYYYMMDD') AS REQ_DATE, USER_NAME, MOD_REASON, ATTACH_FILE, APPROVE_STATE FROM ATTENDANCEMODIFY WHERE APPROVE_STATE != '0' ORDER BY ATTEND_MOD_NUM
SELECT COUNT(ATTEND_MOD_NUM) FROM ATTENDANCEMODIFY WHERE APPROVE_STATE != '0'
